item.title: All About Lambda Function in C++(From C++11 to C++20)
item.description: Lambda function is quite an intuitive & widely loved feature introduced in C++11. And, there are tons of articles & tutorials already available on the topic. But, there are very few or none of them touched upon things like IIFE, types of lambda and newer updates on lambda by subsequent standard releases. So, I got the opportunity to fill the blank. I will start this article with what is lambda function!
